text: Gu nde nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai. Nde tɨva mbatɨk thueŋ muunga fhu. Gu khueŋ nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai fhuvara. Mba gumgi na ganɨv, khaŋ na suanga, gu Krais farasarigi ŋaara guma mbe ma. Fhuvara. Gu khueŋ nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai, nde tɨvir vhuuin muunga. Mbe gumgi mbari khaŋ na nzuai, gu Krais farasarigi ŋaara guma fhuvara, ne nzerara.
